# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-104">Definições da entidade de tipo de informações confidenciais </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-105">A prevenção de perda de dados (DLP) no centro de conformidade inclui muitos tipos de informações confidenciais que estão prontos para uso nas suas políticas de DLP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35310-106">Este tópico lista todos os tipos de informações confidenciais e mostra o que uma política de DLP procura ao detectar cada tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35310-107">Um tipo de informação confidencial é definido por um padrão que pode ser identificado por uma função ou uma expressão regular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35310-108">Além disso, evidências corroborativas, como palavras-chave e somas de verificação, podem ser usadas para identificar um tipo de informação confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35310-109">O nível de confiança e a proximidade também são usados no processo de avaliação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-110">Número de roteamento ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-111">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-112">nove dígitos que podem estar em um padrão formatado ou não formatado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-112">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-113">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-114">Binário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-115">quatro dígitos começando com 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 ou 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-115">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-116">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-116">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-117">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-117">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-118">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-118">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-119">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-119">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-120">Não formatado: nove dígitos consecutivos começando com 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 ou 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-120">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-121">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-122">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-123">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-124">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-125">A função Func_aba_routing localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-126">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ABA_Routing for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-146">Número de identidade nacional (DNI) da Argentina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-147">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-148">Oito dígitos separados por pontos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-148">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-149">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-150">Oito dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-151">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-151">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-152">um período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-152">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-153">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-153">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-154">um período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-154">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-155">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-155">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-156">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-157">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-158">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-159">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-160">A expressão regular Regex_argentina_national_id localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-160">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-161">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_argentina_national_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-173">Número da conta bancária da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-174">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-175">seis a TWN dígitos com ou sem um número de filial do estado do banco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-175">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-176">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-177">O número da conta é de seis a dez dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-177">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-178">Número BSB da Austrália:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-179">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-179">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-180">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-180">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-181">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-181">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-182">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-183">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-184">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-185">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-186">A expressão regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-187">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-188">A expressão regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-189">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-190">A expressão regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-191">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-207">Número de empresa da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-207">Australia business number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-208">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-209">11 dígitos com delimitadores opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-209">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-210">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-211">11 dígitos com delimitadores opcionais:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-211">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-212">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-212">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-213">um hífen ou espaço de opção</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-213">an option hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-214">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-214">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-215">um hífen ou espaço de opção</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-215">an option hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-216">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-216">three digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-218">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-218">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-219">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-220">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-220">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-221">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-222">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-222">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-223">A função Func_australian_business_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-223">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-224">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_australian_business_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-224">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-225">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-225">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-226">A função Func_australian_business_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-226">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-236">Número da empresa Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-236">Australia company number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-237">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-238">nove dígitos com delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-238">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-239">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-240">nove dígitos com delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-240">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-241">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-241">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-242">um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-242">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-243">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-243">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-244">um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-244">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-245">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-245">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-246">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-247">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-248">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-249">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-250">A função Func_Australian_Company_Number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-250">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-251">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_Australian_Company_Number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-251">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-252">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-252">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-253">A função Func_Australian_Company_Number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-253">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-263">Número da carteira de motorista da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-263">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-264">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-265">nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-265">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-266">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-267">nove letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-267">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-268">dois dígitos ou letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-268">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-269">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-269">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-270">cinco dígitos ou letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-270">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-271">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-272">uma ou duas letras opcionais (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-272">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-273">quatro a nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-273">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-274">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-274">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-275">nove dígitos ou letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-275">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-276">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-277">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-277">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-278">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-279">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-280">A expressão regular Regex_australia_drivers_license_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-280">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-281">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-281">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-282">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-282">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-382">Número da conta médica da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-382">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-383">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-384">10 a 11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-384">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-385">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-386">10 a 11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-386">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-387">o primeiro dígito está no intervalo 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-387">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-388">nono dígito é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-388">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-389">décimo dígito é o dígito de saída</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-389">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-390">o décimo primeiro dígito (opcional) é o número individual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-390">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-391">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-392">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-392">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-393">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-394">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-394">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-395">A função Func_australian_medical_account_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-395">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-396">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-396">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-397">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-397">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-409">Número de passaporte da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-409">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-410">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-411">Uma letra seguida por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-411">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-412">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-413">Uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) seguida de sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-413">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-414">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-414">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-415">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-415">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-416">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-416">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-417">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-417">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-418">A expressão regular Regex_australia_passport_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-418">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-419">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_passport ou Keyword_australia_passport_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-419">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-453">Número de arquivo de imposto Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-453">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-454">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-455">8 a nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-455">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-456">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-457">8 a nove dígitos normalmente apresentados com espaços da seguinte maneira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-457">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-458">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-458">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-459">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-459">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-460">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-460">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-461">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-461">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-462">dois a três dígitos onde o último dígito é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-462">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-463">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-464">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-464">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-465">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-466">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-466">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-467">A função Func_australian_tax_file_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-467">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="austria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-509">Número de identificação nacional da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-509">Austria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-510">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-510">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-511">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-511">Format</span></span>

```xml
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-528">Número de passaporte da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-528">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-529">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo sensitiveinformation do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-529">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-532">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-532">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-534">uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-534">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-537">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-538">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-538">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-539">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-540">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-540">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-541">A expressão regular  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-541">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-542">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-542">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-550">Número de segurança social da Áustria ou identificação equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-550">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-551">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no número de seguridade social da UE ou no tipo de informações confidenciais de ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-551">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-552">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-553">10 dígitos no formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-553">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-554">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-555">10 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-555">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-556">três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-556">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-557">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-557">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-558">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-558">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-559">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-560">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-560">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-561">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-562">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-562">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-563">A função ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-563">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-564">_or_equivalent ' localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-564">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-565">uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-565">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-566">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-566">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-567">A função  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-567">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-583">Número de identificação do imposto da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-583">Austria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-584">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível o tipo de informação confidencial do número da ID de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-584">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax ID number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-585">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-586">nove dígitos com hífen opcional e barra para frente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-586">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-587">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-588">nove dígitos com hífen opcional e barra para frente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-588">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-589">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-589">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-590">um hífen (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-590">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-591">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-591">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-592">uma barra (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-592">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-593">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-593">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-594">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-595">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-595">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-596">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-597">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-597">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-598">A função  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-598">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-599">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-599">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-600">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-601">A função  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-601">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-624">Imposto sobre valor agregado da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-624">Austria value added tax</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-625">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-626">padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-626">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-627">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-628">padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-628">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-629">A ou uma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-629">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-630">T ou t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-630">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-631">Espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-631">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-632">U ou u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-632">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-633">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-633">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-634">dois ou três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-634">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-635">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-635">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-636">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-636">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-637">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-637">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-638">um ou dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-638">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-639">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-639">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-640">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-640">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-641">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-641">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-642">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-642">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-643">A função Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-643">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-644">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-644">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-645">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-645">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-646">A função Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-646">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-664">Chave de autenticação do Azure DocumentDB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-664">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-665">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-665">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-666">A cadeia de caracteres "DocumentDb" seguida dos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-666">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-667">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-667">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-668">A cadeia de caracteres "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-668">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-669">Qualquer combinação entre 3-200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-669">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-670">Um símbolo maior que (>), um sinal de igual (=), uma aspa (") ou um apóstrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-670">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-671">Qualquer combinação de 86 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, barra de avanço (/) ou sinal de adição (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-671">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-672">Dois sinais de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-672">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-673">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-674">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-674">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-675">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-676">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-676">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-677">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-677">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-678">A expressão regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords não **localiza o** conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-678">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-679">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-679">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-680">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-680">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-681">(Observe que tecnicamente, esse tipo de informação confidencial identifica essas palavras-chave usando uma expressão regular, não uma lista de palavras-chave.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-681">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-682">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-682">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-683">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-683">fabrikam</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-695">A cadeia de caracteres "Server", "Server" ou "Data Source" seguida dos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo, incluindo a cadeia de caracteres "cloudapp. Azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-695">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="35310-696">com "ou" cloudapp. Azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-696">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="35310-697">NET "ou" Database. Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-697">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="35310-698">NET ", e a cadeia de caracteres" password "ou" password "ou" pwd ".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-698">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-699">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-699">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-700">a cadeia de caracteres "Server", "Server" ou "Data Source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-700">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-701">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-701">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-702">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-702">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-703">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-703">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-704">qualquer combinação entre 1-200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-704">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>

Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-707">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="35310-708">Netlogon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-708">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-709">qualquer combinação entre 1-300 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-709">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-710">a cadeia de caracteres "password", "password" ou "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-710">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-711">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-711">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-712">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-712">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-713">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-713">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-714">um ou mais caracteres que não são ponto-e-vírgula (;), aspas (") ou apóstrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-714">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-715">um ponto e vírgula (;), aspas (") ou apóstrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-715">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-716">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-717">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-717">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-718">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-719">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-719">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-720">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-720">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-721">A expressão regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords não **localiza o** conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-721">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-749">a cadeia de caracteres "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-749">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-750">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-750">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-751">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-751">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-906">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-907">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-907">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-908">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-909">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-910">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-910">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-911">A expressão regular CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter não **localiza o** conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-911">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-912">A expressão regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords não **localiza o** conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-912">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-930">Chave da conta de armazenamento do Azure (genérico)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-930">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-931">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-931">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-932">Qualquer combinação de letras maiúsculas ou minúsculas de 86, dígitos, barra (/) ou sinal de adição (+), precedida ou seguida dos caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-932">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-933">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-933">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-934">zero para um dos símbolos maior que (>), apóstrofo ('), sinal de igual (=), aspas (") ou sinal de número (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-934">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-935">qualquer combinação de 86 caracteres que sejam letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, a barra (/) ou sinal de adição (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-935">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-936">dois sinais de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-936">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-937">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-938">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-938">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-939">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-940">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-940">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-941">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-941">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-942">Número da carteira de motorista do Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-942">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-948">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-948">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-949">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-949">No</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-975">Número nacional da Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-975">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-976">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-976">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-977">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-978">11 dígitos mais delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-978">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-979">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-980">11 dígitos mais delimitadores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-980">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-981">seis dígitos e dois períodos no formato YY. Principal. DD para data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-981">six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-982">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-982">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-983">três dígitos sequenciais (ímpares para homens, mesmo para mulheres)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-983">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-984">um período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-984">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-985">dois dígitos que são um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-985">two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-986">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-987">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-987">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-988">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-989">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-990">A função Func_belgium_national_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-990">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-991">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_belgium_national_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-991">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-992">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1051">Número de passaporte da Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1051">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-1052">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1052">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1053">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1054">duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1054">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1055">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1056">duas letras e seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1056">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1057">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1057">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1058">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1058">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1059">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1059">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1060">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1061">A expressão regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1061">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1062">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1062">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1072">Número da segurança social da Bélgica ou identificação equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1072">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-1073">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no número de seguridade social da UE ou no tipo de informações confidenciais de ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1073">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1074">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1074">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1075">11 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1075">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1076">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1076">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1077">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1077">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1078">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1079">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1079">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1080">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1081">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1081">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1082">A função  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1082">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1083">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1083">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-1084">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1085">A função  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1085">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```
