## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1105">Número de identificação do imposto belga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1105">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-1106">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível o tipo de informação confidencial do número de imposto Identificaiton.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1106">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1107">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1108">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1108">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1109">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1110">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1110">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1111">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1111">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1112">um "0" ou "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1112">a "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1113">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1113">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1114">"0" ou "1" ou "2" ou "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1114">a "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1115">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1115">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1116">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1116">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1117">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1117">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1118">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1118">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1119">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1119">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1120">A expressão regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1120">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1121">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1121">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1180">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor da Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1180">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1181">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1182">padrão alfanumérico de 12 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1182">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1183">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1184">padrão alfanumérico de 12 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1184">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1185">uma letra B ou B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1185">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1186">uma letra E ou E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1186">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1187">um dígito 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1187">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1188">um dígito de 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1188">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1189">um ponto ou hífen opcional ou espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1189">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1190">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1190">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1191">um ponto ou hífen opcional ou espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1191">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1192">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1192">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1193">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1193">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1194">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1194">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1195">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1195">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1196">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1196">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1197">A função Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1197">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1198">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1198">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1199">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1199">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1200">A função Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1200">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1212">Número de CPF do Brasil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1212">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1213">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1214">11 dígitos que incluem um dígito de verificação e podem ser formatados ou não formatados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1214">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1215">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1215">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1216">Binário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1216">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1217">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1217">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1218">um período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1218">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1219">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1219">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1220">um período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1220">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1221">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1221">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1222">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1222">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1223">dois dígitos que são dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1223">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1224">Não formatado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1224">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1225">11 dígitos em que os dois últimos dígitos são dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1225">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1226">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1227">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1227">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1228">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1229">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1229">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1230">A função Func_brazil_cpf localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1230">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1231">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_brazil_cpf for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1231">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1232">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1232">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1233">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1233">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1234">A função Func_brazil_cpf localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1234">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1235">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1235">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1247">Número de entidade legal (CNPJ) do Brasil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1247">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1248">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1249">14 dígitos que incluem um número de registro, o número da ramificação e dígitos de verificação, além de delimitadores de seleção</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1249">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1250">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1250">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1251">14 dígitos mais delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1251">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1252">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1252">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1253">um período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1253">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1254">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1254">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1255">um período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1255">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1256">três dígitos (estes primeiros oito dígitos são o número de registro)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1256">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1257">uma barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1257">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1258">número de filial de quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1258">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1259">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1259">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1260">dois dígitos que são dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1260">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1261">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1262">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1263">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1264">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1265">A função Func_brazil_cnpj localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1265">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1266">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_brazil_cnpj for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1266">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1267">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1267">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1268">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1268">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1269">A função Func_brazil_cnpj localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1269">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1270">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1270">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1292">Cartão de identificação nacional do Brasil (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1292">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1293">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1294">Registro geral (formato antigo): nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1294">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1295">Registro de identidade (RIC) (novo formato): 11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1295">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1296">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1297">Registro Geral (formato antigo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1297">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1298">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1298">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1299">um período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1299">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1300">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1300">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1301">um período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1301">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1302">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1302">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1303">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1303">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1304">um dígito que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1304">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1305">Registro de identidade (RIC) (novo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1305">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1306">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1306">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1307">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1307">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1308">um dígito que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1308">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1309">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1310">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1310">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1311">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1312">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1312">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1313">A função Func_brazil_rg localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1313">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1314">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_brazil_rg for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1314">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1315">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1315">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1316">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1316">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1317">A função Func_brazil_rg localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1317">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1318">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1318">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1329">Número da carteira de motorista do Bulgária</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1329">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-1330">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1330">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1331">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1332">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1332">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1333">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1334">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1334">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1335">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1336">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1336">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1337">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1338">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1338">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1339">A expressão regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1339">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1340">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1340">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1359">Número de identificação nacional da Bulgária</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1359">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-1360">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1360">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1361">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1362">dez dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1362">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1363">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1363">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1364">dez dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1364">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1365">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1365">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1366">dois dígitos que correspondem à ordem de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1366">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1367">um dígito que corresponde ao gênero: um dígito par para macho e um dígito estranho para o fêmea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1367">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1368">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1368">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1369">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1370">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1370">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1371">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1372">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1372">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1373">A função  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1373">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1374">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1374">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1375">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1375">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1376">A função  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1376">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1421">Número de passaporte da Bulgária</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1421">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-1422">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1422">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1423">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1424">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1424">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1425">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1426">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1426">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1427">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1428">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1428">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1429">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1430">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1430">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1431">A expressão regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1431">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1432">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1432">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1439">Número de identificação de imposto da Bulgária</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1439">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-1440">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1440">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1441">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1441">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1442">dez dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1442">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1443">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1443">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1444">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1444">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1445">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1446">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1446">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1447">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1448">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1448">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1449">A função  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1449">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1450">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1450">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1451">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1451">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1452">A função  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1452">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1497">Número de conta bancária do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1497">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1498">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1499">sete ou doze dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1499">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1500">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1501">Um número de conta bancária do Canadá tem sete ou doze dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1501">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1502">Um número de trânsito de conta bancária do Canadá tem:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1502">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1503">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1503">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1504">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1504">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1505">três dígitos ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1505">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1506">um zero "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1506">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1507">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1507">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1508">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1508">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1509">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1509">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1510">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1510">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1511">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1511">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1512">A expressão regular Regex_canada_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1512">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1513">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1513">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1514">A expressão regular Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1514">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1515">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1515">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1516">A expressão regular Regex_canada_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1516">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1517">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1517">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1541">Número da carteira de motorista do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1541">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1542">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1543">Varia por província</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1543">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1544">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1545">Vários padrões que abrangem Alberta, Columbia Britânica, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Escócia, Ontário, Ilha do Príncipe Eduardo, Quebec e Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1545">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1546">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1547">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1547">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1548">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1549">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1549">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1550">A função Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1550">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1551">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1551">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1552">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1552">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->

      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />

      </Pattern>

        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1688">Número do serviço de integridade do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1688">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1689">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1690">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1690">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1691">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1692">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1692">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1693">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1694">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1694">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1695">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1696">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1696">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1697">A expressão regular Regex_canada_health_service_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1697">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1698">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_health_service_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1698">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1699">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1699">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1700">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1700">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1701">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1701">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1702">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1702">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1703">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1703">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1704">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1704">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1705">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1705">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1706">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1706">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1707">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1707">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1708">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1708">workers compensation</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1710">Número de passaporte do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1710">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1711">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1711">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1712">duas letras maiúsculas seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1712">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1713">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1713">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1714">duas letras maiúsculas seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1714">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1715">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1716">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1717">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1718">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1718">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1719">A expressão regular Regex_canada_passport_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1719">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1720">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_passport_number ou Keyword_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1720">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">

        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1750">Número de identificação de saúde pessoal do Canadá (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1750">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1751">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1752">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1752">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1753">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1754">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1754">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1755">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1756">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1756">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1757">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1758">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1758">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1759">A expressão regular Regex_canada_phin localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1759">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1760">São encontradas pelo menos duas palavras-chave de Keyword_canada_phin ou Keyword_canada_provinces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1760">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1793">Número de seguro social do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1793">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1794">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1795">nove dígitos com hifens ou espaços opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1795">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1796">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1797">Binário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1797">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1798">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1798">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1799">um hífen ou espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1799">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1800">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1800">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1801">um hífen ou espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1801">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1802">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1802">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1803">Não formatado: nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1803">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1804">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1805">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1805">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1806">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1807">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1808">A função Func_canadian_sin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1808">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1809">Pelo menos duas de qualquer combinação do seguinte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1809">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-1810">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1810">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-1811">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_sin_collaborative for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1811">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-1812">A função Func_eu_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1812">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1813">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1813">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1814">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1814">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1815">A função Func_unformatted_canadian_sin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1815">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1816">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1816">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1817">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1817">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1842">Número do cartão de identidade do Chile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1842">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1843">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1844">sete a oito dígitos mais delimitadores um dígito ou letra de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1844">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1845">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1845">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1846">sete a oito dígitos mais delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1846">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1847">um a dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1847">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1848">um período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1848">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1849">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1849">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1850">um período</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1850">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1851">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1851">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1852">um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1852">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1853">um dígito ou letra (não diferencia maiúscula de minúscula), que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1853">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1854">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1855">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1856">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1857">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1857">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1858">A função Func_chile_id_card localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1858">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1859">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_chile_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1859">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1860">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1860">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1861">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1861">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1862">A função Func_chile_id_card localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1862">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1863">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1863">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1878">Número do cartão de identidade residente (PRC) da China</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1878">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1879">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1879">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1880">18 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1880">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1881">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1881">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1882">18 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1882">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1883">seis dígitos que são um código de endereço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1883">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1884">oito dígitos no formato AAAAMMDD que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1884">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1885">três dígitos que são um código de pedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1885">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1886">um dígito que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1886">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1887">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1887">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1888">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1888">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1889">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1889">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1890">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1890">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1891">A função Func_china_resident_id localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1891">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1892">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_china_resident_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1892">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1893">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1893">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1894">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1894">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1895">A função Func_china_resident_id localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1895">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1896">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1896">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1909">Número do cartão de crédito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1909">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1910">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1910">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1911">14 a 16 dígitos que podem ser formatados ou não formatados (dddddddddddddddd) e que devem passar no teste Luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1911">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1912">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1912">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1913">Padrão muito complexo e robusto que detecta cartões de todas as principais marcas em todo o mundo, incluindo Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, vales-presentes e cartões diner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1913">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1914">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1914">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1915">Sim, a soma de verificação Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1915">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-1916">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1916">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1917">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1917">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1918">A função Func_credit_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1918">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1919">Uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1919">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-1920">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_cc_verification for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1920">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-1921">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_cc_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1921">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-1922">A função Func_expiration_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1922">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1923">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1923">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-1924">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1924">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1925">A função Func_credit_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1925">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-1926">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-1926">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2186">Número da carteira de motorista da Croácia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2186">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2187">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2187">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2188">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2189">oito dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2189">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2190">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2191">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2191">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2192">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2193">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2193">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2194">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2195">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2195">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2196">A expressão regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2196">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2197">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2197">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
