## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2213">Número do cartão de identidade da Croácia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2213">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2214">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2214">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2215">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2216">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2216">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2217">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2218">nove dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2218">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2219">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2220">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2220">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2221">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2222">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2223">A função Func_croatia_id_card localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2223">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2224">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_croatia_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2224">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2255">Número de passaporte da Croácia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2255">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2256">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2256">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2257">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2258">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2258">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2259">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2260">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2260">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2261">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2262">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2262">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2263">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2264">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2264">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2265">A expressão regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2265">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2266">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2266">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2273">Número de identificação pessoal da Croácia (NIB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2273">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2274">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2275">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2275">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2276">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2277">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2277">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2278">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2278">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2279">o dígito final é um dígito de verificação para os fins de troca de dados internacionais, as letras de RH são adicionadas antes dos onze dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2279">final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2280">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2280">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2281">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2281">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2282">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2282">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2283">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2283">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2284">A função Func_croatia_oib_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2284">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2285">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_croatia_oib_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2285">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2286">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2286">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2287">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2287">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2288">A função Func_croatia_oib_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2288">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2289">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2289">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2295">Número da segurança social da Croácia ou identificação equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2295">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2296">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no número de seguridade social da UE ou no tipo de informações confidenciais de ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2296">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2297">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2297">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2298">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2298">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2299">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2299">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2300">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2300">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2301">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2301">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2302">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2302">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2303">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2303">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2304">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2304">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2305">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2305">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2306">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2306">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2307">A função  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2307">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2308">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2308">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2309">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2309">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2310">A função  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2310">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2327">Número de identificação do imposto da Croácia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2327">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2328">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de imposto da UE Identificaiton.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2328">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2329">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2330">11 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2330">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2331">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2332">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2332">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2333">dez dígitos, escolhidos aleatoriamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2333">ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2334">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2334">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2335">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2336">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2336">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2337">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2338">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2338">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2339">A função  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2339">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2340">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2340">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2341">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2342">A função  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2342">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml

<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2373">Número de licença de drivers de Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2373">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2384">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2384">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2419">Número de passaporte do Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2419">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2420">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2420">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2421">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2421">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2422">uma letra seguida de 6-8 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2422">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2423">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2423">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2424">uma letra seguida de seis a oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2424">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2425">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2425">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2426">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2426">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2427">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2427">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2428">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2428">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2429">A expressão regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2429">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2430">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2430">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2437">Número de identificação do imposto do Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2437">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2438">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2439">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2440">oito dígitos e uma letra no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2440">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2441">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2442">oito dígitos e uma letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2442">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2443">um "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2443">a "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2444">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2444">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2445">uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2445">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2446">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2446">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2447">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2447">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2448">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2448">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2449">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2449">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2450">A função  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2450">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2451">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2451">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2452">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2452">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2453">A função  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2453">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2482">Número da carteira de motorista do tcheco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2482">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2483">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2484">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2485">duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2485">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2486">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2487">oito letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2487">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2488">duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2488">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2489">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2489">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2490">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2490">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2491">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2492">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2493">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2494">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2495">A expressão regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2495">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2496">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2496">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2513">Número de passaporte tcheco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2513">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2514">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2514">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2515">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2516">oito dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2516">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2517">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2518">oito dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2518">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2519">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2520">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2520">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2521">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2522">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2523">A expressão regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2523">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2524">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2524">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2532">Número de identidade pessoal tcheco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2532">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2533">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no pacote de números de identificação nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2533">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2534">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2534">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2535">nove dígitos com barra de avanço opcional (formato antigo) dez dígitos com barra de avanço opcional (novo formato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2535">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2536">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2536">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2537">nove dígitos (formato antigo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2537">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2538">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2538">nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2539">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2539">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2540">seis dígitos que representam a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2540">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2541">uma barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2541">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2542">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2542">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2543">dez dígitos (novo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2543">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2544">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2544">ten digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2545">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2545">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2546">seis dígitos que representam a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2546">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2547">uma barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2547">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2548">quatro dígitos onde o último dígito é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2548">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2549">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2550">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2551">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2552">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2553">A função Func_czech_id_card localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2553">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2554">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_czech_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2554">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2555">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2559">Número de seguro social ou identificação equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2559">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2560">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no número de seguridade social da UE ou no tipo de informações confidenciais de ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2560">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2561">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2562">dez dígitos e uma barra invertida no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2562">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2563">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2564">dez dígitos e uma barra invertida:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2564">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2565">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2565">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2566">uma barra invertida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2566">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2567">três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série que separa as pessoas nasceu na mesma data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2567">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2568">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2568">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2569">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2570">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2570">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2571">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2572">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2572">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2573">A função  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2573">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2574">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2574">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2575">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2575">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2576">A função  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2576">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2592">Número de identificação do imposto tcheco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2592">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2593">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2593">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2594">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2594">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2595">nove ou dez dígitos com uma barra invertida opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2595">nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2596">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2596">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2597">nove ou dez dígitos com uma barra invertida opcional:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2597">nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2598">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2598">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2599">uma barra invertida (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2599">a backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2600">três ou quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2600">three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2601">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2602">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2602">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2603">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2604">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2604">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2605">A expressão regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2605">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2606">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2606">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2645">Número da carteira de motorista da Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2645">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2647">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2647">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2649">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2650">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2650">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2651">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2651">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2653">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2653">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2654">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2655">A expressão regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2655">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2656">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2656">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2673">Número de passaporte da Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2673">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2674">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2674">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2675">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2675">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2676">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2676">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2677">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2677">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2678">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2678">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2679">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2679">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2680">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2680">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2681">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2681">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2682">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2682">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2683">A expressão regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2683">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2684">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2684">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2692">Número de identificação pessoal da Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2692">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2693">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2693">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2694">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2695">dez dígitos contendo um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2695">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2696">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2697">dez dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2697">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2698">seis dígitos no formato DDMMAA que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2698">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2699">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2699">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2700">quatro dígitos em que o último dígito é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2700">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2701">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2702">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2702">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2703">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2704">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2705">A expressão regular Regex_denmark_id localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2705">The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2706">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_denmark_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2706">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2707">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2707">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2759">Número da segurança social da Dinamarca ou identificação equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2759">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2760">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no número de segurança social da UE ou no tipo de informação confidencial de ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2760">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2761">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2762">dez dígitos e um hífen no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2762">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2763">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2764">dez dígitos e um hífen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2764">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2765">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2765">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2766">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2766">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2767">quatro dígitos que correspondem a um número de sequência</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2767">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2768">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2769">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2769">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2770">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2771">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2771">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2772">A função  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2772">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2773">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2773">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2774">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2774">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2775">A função  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2775">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2776">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2776">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2777">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2777">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2789">Número de identificação do imposto da Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2789">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2790">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2790">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2791">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2792">dez dígitos contendo um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2792">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2793">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2794">dez dígitos contendo um hífen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2794">ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2795">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2795">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2796">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2796">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2797">quatro dígitos que correspondem a um número de sequência onde o primeiro dígito corresponde ao século do nascimento e o último dígito corresponde ao sexo da pessoa (ímpar para macho e par para fêmea)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2797">four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2798">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2799">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2799">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2800">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2801">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2801">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2802">A função  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2802">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2803">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2803">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2804">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2804">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2805">A função  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2805">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2857">Número da Agência de aplicação de medicamentos (DEA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2857">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2858">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2859">duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2859">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2860">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2861">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2861">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2862">uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) desse conjunto de possíveis letras: abcdefghjklmnprstux, que é um código inscrito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2862">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2863">uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas), que é a primeira letra do sobrenome do inscrito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2863">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2864">sete dígitos, o último que é o dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2864">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2865">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2866">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2867">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2868">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2868">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2869">A função Func_dea_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2869">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2870">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2870">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2871">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2871">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2872">Nenhuma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2872">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2873">Número da carteira de motorista do Estônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2873">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2874">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2874">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2875">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2876">duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2876">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2877">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2878">duas letras e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2878">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2879">as letras "ET" (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2879">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2880">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2880">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2881">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2881">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2882">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2882">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2883">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2883">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2884">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2884">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2885">A expressão regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2885">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2886">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2886">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2902">Número de identificação nacional da Estônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2902">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2903">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2903">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2904">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2905">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2905">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2906">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2907">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2907">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2908">um dígito que corresponde ao sexo e ao século de nascimento (número ímpar masculino, mesmo número fêmea; 1-2:19 Century; 3-4:20 Century; 5-6:21 século)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2908">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2909">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2909">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2910">três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série separando as pessoas que nasceu na mesma data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2910">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2911">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2911">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2912">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2913">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2913">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2914">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2915">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2915">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2916">A função  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2916">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2917">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2917">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2918">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2918">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2919">A função  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2919">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2952">Número de passaporte da Estônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2952">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2953">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2953">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2954">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2955">uma letra seguida por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2955">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2956">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2956">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2957">uma letra seguida por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2957">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2958">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2959">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2959">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2960">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2961">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2961">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2962">A expressão regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2962">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2963">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2963">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
