## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2970">Número de identificação de imposto da Estônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2970">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2971">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2971">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2972">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2972">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2973">11 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2973">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2974">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2974">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2975">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2975">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2976">Um dígito que corresponde ao gênero e ao século de nascimento onde um número ímpar indica macho e o número par indica fêmea da seguinte maneira: 1, 2 para o século 19; 3, 4 para o século 20; e 5, 6 para o século 21</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2976">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2977">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2977">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2978">três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série separando as pessoas que nasceu na mesma data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2978">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2979">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2979">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2980">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2981">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2981">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-2982">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-2983">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2984">A função  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2984">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2985">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2985">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-2986">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2986">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-2987">A função  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-2987">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3020">Número de cartão de débito da UE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3020">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3021">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3022">16 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3022">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3023">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3024">Padrão muito complexo e robusto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3024">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3025">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3026">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3026">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3027">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3028">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3028">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3029">A função Func_eu_debit_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3029">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3030">Pelo menos uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3030">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-3031">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_eu_debit_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3031">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-3032">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_card_terms_dict for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3032">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-3033">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_card_security_terms_dict for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3033">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-3034">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3034">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-3035">A função Func_expiration_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3035">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3036">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3036">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3482">Número da carteira de motorista do Finlândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3482">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3483">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3484">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3485">dez dígitos contendo um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3485">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3486">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3487">dez dígitos contendo um hífen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3487">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3488">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3488">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3489">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3489">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3490">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3490">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3491">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3492">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3493">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3494">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3495">A expressão regular  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3495">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3496">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3496">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3512">Número de seguro de saúde da Finlândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3512">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3513">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3514">número de 20 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3514">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3515">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3516">número de 20 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3516">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3517">dez dígitos-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3517">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3518">um espaço ou hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3518">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3519">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3519">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3520">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3521">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3522">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3523">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3523">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3524">A Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number Regex localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3524">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3525">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3525">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3526">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3526">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3527">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3527">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3528">ehic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3528">ehic#</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3543">Número de identificação nacional da Finlândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3543">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3544">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3544">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3545">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3545">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3546">seis dígitos mais um caractere indicando um século mais três dígitos mais um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3546">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3547">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3547">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3548">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3548">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3549">seis dígitos no formato de formato DDMMAA que são uma data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3549">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3550">marcador de século ('-', ' + ' ou ' a ')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3550">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3551">número de identificação pessoal de três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3551">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3552">um dígito ou letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas), que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3552">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3553">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3554">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3554">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3555">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3556">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3556">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3557">a função Func_finnish_national_id localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3557">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3558">uma palavra-chave de Keyword_finnish_national_id for encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3558">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3559">o checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3559">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3608">Número de passaporte da Finlândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3608">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3609">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3609">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3610">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3610">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3611">combinação de nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3611">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3612">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3612">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3613">combinação de nove letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3613">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3614">duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3614">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3615">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3615">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3616">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3617">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3617">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3618">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3619">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3619">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3620">A expressão regular Regex_finland_passport_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3620">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3621">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_finland_passport_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3621">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3622">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3622">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3623">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3623">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3624">Passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3624">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3625">Passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3625">Passi</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3626">Número de segurança social da Finlândia ou identificação equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3626">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3627">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no número de seguridade social da UE ou no tipo de informações confidenciais de ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3627">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3628">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3628">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3629">Uma combinação de 11 caracteres no formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3629">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3630">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3630">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3631">uma combinação de 11 caracteres no formato especificado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3631">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3632">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3632">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3633">uma instância de um dos seguintes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3633">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="35310-3634">símbolo de adição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3634">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="35310-3635">símbolo de subtração</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3635">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="35310-3636">a letra "A" (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3636">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3637">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3637">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3638">uma letra ou um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3638">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3639">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3639">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3640">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3640">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3641">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3641">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3642">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3642">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3643">A função  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3643">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3644">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3644">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3645">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3645">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3646">A função  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3646">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3670">Número de identificação do imposto Finlândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3670">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3671">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3671">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3672">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3672">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3673">uma combinação de 11 caracteres de dígitos, letras e sinal de mais e de menos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3673">an 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3674">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3674">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3675">uma combinação de 11 caracteres de dígitos, letras e sinal de mais e menos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3675">an 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3676">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3676">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3677">uma das seguintes opções: um sinal de adição, um sinal de menos ou a letra "A" (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) onde o sinal de mais significa que nasceu entre 1800-1899, o sinal de menos significa que nasceu entre 1900-1999 e "A" significa que nasceu 2000 e depois</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3677">one of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3678">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3678">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3679">uma letra ou um número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3679">one letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3680">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3681">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3681">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3682">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3683">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3683">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3684">A função  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3684">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3685">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3685">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3686">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3686">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3687">A função  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3687">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3738">Número da carteira de motorista da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3738">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3739">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de carteira do driver da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3739">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3740">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3740">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3741">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3741">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3742">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3742">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3743">12 dígitos com a validação para descontar padrões similares, como números de telefone em francês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3743">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3744">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3744">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3745">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3745">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3746">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3746">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3747">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3747">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3748">a função Func_french_drivers_license localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3748">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3749">pelo menos uma das seguintes opções é verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3749">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3750">uma palavra-chave de Keyword_french_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3750">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3751">a função Func_eu_date localiza uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3751">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3752">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3752">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_french_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3753">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3753">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3754">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3754">drivers licence</span></span>

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3763">Número de seguro de saúde da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3763">France health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3764">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3765">número de 21 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3765">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3766">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3767">número de 21 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3767">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3768">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3768">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3769">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3769">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3770">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3770">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3771">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3771">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3772">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3772">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3773">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3774">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3775">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3776">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3776">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3777">a Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number Regex localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3777">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3778">uma palavra-chave de Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3778">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3784">Cartão de identificação nacional da França (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3784">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3785">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3785">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3786">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3786">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3787">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3787">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3788">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3788">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3789">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3789">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3790">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3791">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3791">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3792">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3793">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3793">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3794">A expressão regular Regex_france_cni localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3794">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3807">Número de passaporte da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3807">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3808">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3808">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3809">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3810">nove dígitos e letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3810">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3811">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3812">nove dígitos e letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3812">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3813">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3813">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3814">duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3814">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3815">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3815">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3816">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3817">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3817">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3818">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3819">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3819">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3820">A função Func_fr_passport localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3820">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3821">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3821">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3842">Número de segurança social da França (INSEE) ou identificação equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3842">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3843">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no número de segurança social da UE e o tipo de informação confidencial de ID equivalente e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3843">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3844">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3845">15 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3845">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3846">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3847">Deve corresponder a um dos dois padrões:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3847">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3848">13 dígitos seguidos de um espaço seguido de dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3848">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3849">ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3849">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3850">15 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3850">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3851">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3852">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3852">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3853">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3854">Uma política de DLP tem 95% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3854">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3855">A função Func_french_insee ou Func_fr_insee localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3855">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3856">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_fr_insee for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3856">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3857">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3857">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3858">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3858">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3859">A função Func_french_insee ou Func_fr_insee localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3859">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3860">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_fr_insee for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3860">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3861">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3861">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3862">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3862">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3863">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3863">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3864">INSEE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3864">insee</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3865">securité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3865">securité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3866">securite sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3866">securite sociale</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3887">Número de identificação de imposto da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3887">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3888">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3888">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3889">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3889">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3890">13 dígitos para pessoas e nove dígitos para entidades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3890">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3891">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3891">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3892">13 dígitos para pessoas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3892">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3893">um dígito que deve ser 0, 1, 2 ou 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3893">one digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3894">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3894">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3895">nove dígitos para entidades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3895">nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3896">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3896">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3897">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3897">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3898">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3898">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3899">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3899">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3900">A função  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3900">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3901">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3901">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3902">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3902">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3903">A função  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3903">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3923">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3923">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3924">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3925">padrão de 13 caracteres alfanuméricos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3925">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3926">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3926">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3927">padrão de 13 caracteres alfanuméricos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3927">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3928">duas letras-FR (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3928">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3929">um espaço ou hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3929">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3930">duas letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3930">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3931">um espaço, ponto, hífen ou vírgula opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3931">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3932">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3932">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3933">um espaço, ponto, hífen ou vírgula opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3933">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3934">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3934">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3935">um espaço, ponto, hífen ou vírgula opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3935">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3936">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3936">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3937">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3938">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3938">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3939">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3940">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3940">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3941">A função Func_france_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3941">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3942">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3942">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3943">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3944">A função Func_france_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3944">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3957">Número da carteira de motorista da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3957">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-3958">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de carteira do driver da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3958">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3959">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3959">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3960">combinação de 11 dígitos e letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3960">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3961">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3961">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3962">11 dígitos e letras (não diferenciam maiúsculas de minúsculas):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3962">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3963">um dígito ou letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3963">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3964">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3964">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3965">seis dígitos ou letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3965">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3966">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3966">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3967">um dígito ou letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3967">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3968">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3969">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3969">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-3970">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-3971">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3971">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3972">A função Func_german_drivers_license localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3972">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3973">Pelo menos uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3973">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-3974">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_german_drivers_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3974">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-3975">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3975">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-3976">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_german_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3976">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-3977">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-3977">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4070">Número do cartão de identidade da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4070">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4071">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4071">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4072">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no número de seguridade social da UE ou no tipo de informação confidencial de ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4072">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4073">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4074">desde 1 de novembro de 2010: nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4074">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4075">de 1 de abril de 1987 até 31 de outubro de 2010:10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4075">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4076">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4076">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4077">desde 1 de novembro de 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4077">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4078">uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4078">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4079">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4079">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4080">de 1 de abril de 1987 até 31 de outubro de 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4080">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4081">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4081">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4082">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4082">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4083">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4083">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4084">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4084">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4085">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4085">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4086">A expressão regular Regex_germany_id_card localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4086">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4087">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_germany_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4087">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4103">Número de passaporte da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4103">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4104">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4104">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4105">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4105">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4106">dez dígitos ou letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4106">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4107">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4107">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4108">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4108">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4109">o primeiro caractere é um dígito ou uma letra desse conjunto (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4109">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4110">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4110">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4111">cinco dígitos ou letras desse conjunto (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4111">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4112">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4112">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4113">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4114">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4115">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4116">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4116">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4117">A função Func_german_passport localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4117">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4118">Uma palavra-chave de qualquer uma das cinco listas de palavras-chave for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4118">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4119">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4119">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4120">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4120">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4121">A função Func_german_passport_data localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4121">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4122">Uma palavra-chave de qualquer uma das cinco listas de palavras-chave for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4122">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4123">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4123">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4141">Número de identificação do imposto da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4141">Germany tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4142">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4142">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4145">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4145">Pattern</span></span>
