### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4149">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4150">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4150">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4151">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4152">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4152">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4153">A função  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4153">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4154">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4154">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4155">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4155">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4156">A função  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4156">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />

</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4182">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4182">Germany value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4183">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4184">padrão de 11 caracteres alfanuméricos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4184">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4185">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4186">padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4186">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4187">uma letra D ou d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4187">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4188">uma letra E ou E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4188">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4189">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4189">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4190">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4190">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4191">um espaço ou vírgula opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4191">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4192">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4192">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4193">um espaço ou vírgula opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4193">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4194">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4194">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4195">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4196">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4197">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4198">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4199">A função Func_germany_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4199">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4200">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4200">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4201">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4201">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4202">A função Func_germany_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4202">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4203">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4203">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4204">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4204">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4205">número de IVA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4205">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4206">IVA não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4206">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4207">IVA #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4207">vat#</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4212">Número da carteira de motorista do Grécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4212">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4213">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de carteira do driver da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4213">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4214">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4215">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4215">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4216">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4217">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4217">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4218">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4219">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4219">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4220">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4221">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4221">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4222">A expressão regular  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4222">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4223">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4223">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4240">Cartão de identificação nacional da Grécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4240">Greece national ID card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4241">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4241">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4242">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4242">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4243">Combinação de 7 a 8 letras e números mais um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4243">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4244">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4244">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4245">Sete letras e números (formato antigo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4245">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4246">Uma letra (qualquer letra do alfabeto grego) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4246">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4247">Um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4247">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4248">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4248">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4249">Oito letras e números (novo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4249">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4250">Duas letras cujos caracteres maiúsculos ocorre em alfabetos latino e grego (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4250">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4251">Um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4251">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4252">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4252">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4253">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4254">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4254">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4255">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4256">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4256">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4257">A expressão regular Regex_greece_id_card localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4257">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4258">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_greece_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4258">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Greece National ID Card -->
<Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4269">Número de passaporte da Grécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4269">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4270">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4270">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4271">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4271">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4273">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4273">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4275">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4278">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4278">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4279">A expressão regular  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4279">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4280">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4280">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4327">Número do cartão de identidade de Hong Kong (HKID)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4327">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4328">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4329">Combinação de 8 a 9 letras e números mais parênteses opcionais ao redor do caractere final</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4329">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4330">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4331">Combinação de 8 a 9 letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4331">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4332">1 a 2 letras (não diferenciam maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4332">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4333">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4333">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4334">O caractere final (qualquer dígito ou a letra A), que é o dígito de verificação e é opcionalmente colocado entre parênteses.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4334">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4335">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4336">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4337">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4338">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4338">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4339">A função Func_hong_kong_id_card localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4339">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4340">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_hong_kong_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4340">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4341">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4341">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4342">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4342">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4343">A função Func_hong_kong_id_card localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4343">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4344">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4344">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4384">Número da carteira de motorista do Hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4384">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4385">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4385">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4386">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4387">Duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4387">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4388">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4389">Duas letras e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4389">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4390">Duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4390">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4391">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4391">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4392">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4393">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4393">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4394">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4395">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4395">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4396">A expressão regular  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4396">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4397">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4397">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4413">Número de identificação nacional da Hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4413">Hungary national identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4414">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4414">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4415">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4416">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4416">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4417">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4418">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4418">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="35310-4419">Um dígito que corresponde ao gênero (1-macho, 2-fêmea, outros números também são possíveis para o cidadãos nasceu antes 1900 ou cidadãos com cidadania dupla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4419">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4420">Seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4420">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4421">Três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4421">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4422">Um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4422">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4423">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4424">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4424">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4425">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4426">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4426">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4441">Número de passaporte da Hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4441">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4445">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4446">Duas letras seguidas por seis ou sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4446">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4447">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4447">Checksum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4451">A expressão regular  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4451">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4459">Número da segurança social da Hungria ou identificação equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4459">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4460">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no número de seguridade social da UE ou no tipo de informações confidenciais de ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4460">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4461">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4462">Nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4462">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4463">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4464">Nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4464">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4465">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4466">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4466">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4467">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4468">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4468">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4469">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4469">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4470">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4470">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4471">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4471">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4472">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4472">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4492">Número de identificação do imposto Hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4492">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4493">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4493">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4494">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4495">Dez dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4495">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4496">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4497">Dez dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4497">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4498">Um dígito que deve ser "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4498">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4499">Cinco dígitos que correspondem ao número de dias entre a data 01/01/1867 e a data do nascimento da pessoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4499">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4501">Um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4501">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4502">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4503">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4503">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4504">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4505">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4505">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4506">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4506">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4507">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4507">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4508">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4508">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4509">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4509">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>

          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4535">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor Hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4535">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4536">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4537">padrão de 10 caracteres alfanuméricos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4537">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4538">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4539">padrão de 10 caracteres alfanuméricos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4539">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4540">2 letras-HU ou Hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4540">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4541">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4541">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4542">8 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4542">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4543">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4543">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4544">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4544">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4545">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4545">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4546">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4546">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4547">A função Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4547">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4548">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4548">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4549">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4549">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4550">A função Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4550">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4564">Número da conta permanente da Índia (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4564">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4565">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4566">10 letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4566">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4567">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4568">10 letras ou dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4568">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4569">Cinco letras (não diferenciam maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4569">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4570">Quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4570">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4571">Uma letra que é um dígito de verificação alfabético</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4571">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4572">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4572">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4573">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4573">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4574">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4574">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4575">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4575">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4576">A expressão regular Regex_india_permanent_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4576">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4577">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_india_permanent_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4577">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4578">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4578">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4579">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4579">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4583">Número de identificação exclusiva da Índia (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4583">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4584">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4584">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4585">12 dígitos contendo espaços opcionais ou traços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4585">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4586">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4586">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4587">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4587">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4588">Quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4588">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4589">Um espaço ou um traço opcional </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4589">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4590">Quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4590">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4591">Um espaço ou um traço opcional </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4591">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4592">O dígito final que é o dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4592">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4593">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4593">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4594">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4594">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4595">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4595">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4596">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4596">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4597">A função Func_india_aadhaar localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4597">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4598">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_india_aadhar for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4598">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4599">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4599">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4600">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4601">A função Func_india_aadhaar localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4601">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4602">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4602">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4609">Número do cartão de identidade da Indonésia (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4609">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4610">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4611">16 dígitos contendo pontos opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4611">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4612">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4613">16 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4613">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4614">Código de província de dois dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4614">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4615">Um ponto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4615">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4616">Código de dois dígitos da regência ou da cidade </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4616">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4617">Código de dois dígitos do subdistrito </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4617">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4618">Um ponto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4618">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4619">Seis dígitos no formato DDMMAA que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4619">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4620">Um ponto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4620">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4621">Quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4621">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4622">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4622">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4623">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4623">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4624">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4624">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4625">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4625">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4626">A expressão regular Regex_indonesia_id_card localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4626">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4627">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_indonesia_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4627">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4628">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4628">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4629">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4629">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4633">Número de conta bancária internacional (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4633">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4634">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4635">Código do país (duas letras) mais dígitos de verificação (dois dígitos) mais Bban número (até 30 caracteres)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4635">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4636">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4637">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4637">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4638">Código de país de duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4638">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4639">Dois dígitos de verificação (seguidos por um espaço opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4639">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4640">1-7 grupos de quatro letras ou dígitos (podem ser separados por espaços)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4640">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4641">1 a 3 letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4641">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4642">O formato de cada país é um pouco diferente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4642">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35310-4643">O tipo de informação confidencial do IBAN cobre estes 60 países:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4643">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4644">AD, AE, Al, at, AZ, BA, or, BG, BH, ch, CR, Cy, cz, de, DK, do, EE, es, Fi, fo, FR, GB, GE, GI, GL, GA, HR, Hu, IE, Il, is, it, kW, KZ, lb, li, lt, Lu, LV, MC, MD, me, MK, Sr, MT, MU, NL, não, pl, pt,, RS, SK, SM, TN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4644">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4645">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4646">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4646">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4647">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4648">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4648">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4649">A função Func_iban localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4649">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4650">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4650">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

```xml
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4689">Endereço IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4689">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4690">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4690">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4691">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4691">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4692">Padrão complexo que é responsável por versões formatadas (pontos) e não formatadas (sem pontos) dos endereços IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4692">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4693">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4693">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4694">Padrão complexo que é responsável por números IPv6 formatados (que incluem dois pontos)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4694">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4695">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4695">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4696">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4697">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4698">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4699">Para IPv6, uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4699">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4700">A expressão regular Regex_ipv6_address localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4700">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4701">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_ipaddress for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4701">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4702">Para IPv4, uma política de DLP tem 95% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4702">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4703">A expressão regular Regex_ipv4_address localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4703">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4704">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ipaddress for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4704">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4705">Para IPv6, uma política de DLP tem 95% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4705">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4706">A expressão regular Regex_ipv6_address localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4706">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4707">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_ipaddress for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4707">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4744">Número de identificação nacional da Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4744">Ireland national identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4745">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só é incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4745">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4746">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4747">Uma combinação de letras, dígitos e um espaço no padrão especificado de nove caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4747">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4748">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4749">Uma combinação de letras, dígitos e um espaço no padrão especificado de nove caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4749">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4750">De 1º de janeiro de 2013 até agora:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4750">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4751">Sete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4751">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4752">Um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4752">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4753">Um espaço ou a letra maiúscula "W" (diferencia maiúscula de minúscula)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4753">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4754">Antes de 1º de janeiro de 2013:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4754">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4755">Sete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4755">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4756">Um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4756">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4757">Um espaço ou uma letra maiúscula (diferencia maiúscula de minúscula)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4757">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4758">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4759">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4759">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4760">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4761">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4762">A função localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4762">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4763">Uma palavra-chave de foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4763">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4764">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4765">A função localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4765">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4794">Número de passaporte da Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4794">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4795">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4795">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4796">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4797">Duas letras ou dígitos seguidos de sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4797">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4798">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4799">Duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4799">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4800">Dois dígitos ou letras (não diferenciam maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4800">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4801">Sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4801">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4802">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4803">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4803">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4804">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4805">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4805">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4806">A expressão regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4806">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4807">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4807">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4817">Número de serviço público pessoal (PPS) da Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4817">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4818">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4819">Formato antigo (até 31 de dezembro de 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4819">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4820">sete dígitos seguidos por 1-2 letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4820">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4821">Novo formato (1 Jan 2013 e posterior):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4821">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4822">sete dígitos seguidos de duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4822">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4823">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4823">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4824">Formato antigo (até 31 de dezembro de 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4824">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4825">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4825">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4826">uma ou duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4826">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4827">Novo formato (1 Jan 2013 e posterior):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4827">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4828">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4828">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4829">uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) que é um dígito de verificação alfabética</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4829">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4830">a letra "A" ou "H" (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4830">the letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4831">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4831">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4832">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4832">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4833">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4833">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4834">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4834">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4835">A função Func_ireland_pps localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4835">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4836">Uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4836">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-4837">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ireland_pps for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4837">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-4838">A função Func_eu_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4838">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4839">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4839">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4840">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4840">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4841">A função Func_ireland_pps localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4841">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4842">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
