## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4857">Número de identificação de imposto da Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4857">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4858">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4858">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4859">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4860">sete dígitos seguidos de uma letra sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4860">seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4861">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4862">sete dígitos seguidos de uma letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4862">seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4863">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4863">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4864">uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4864">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4865">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4866">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4866">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4867">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4868">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4868">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4869">A função  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4869">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4870">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4870">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4871">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4871">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4872">A função  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4872">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4901">Número de conta bancária de Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4901">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4902">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4903">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4903">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4904">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4905">Binário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4905">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4906">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4906">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4907">um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4907">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4908">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4908">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4909">um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4909">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4910">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4910">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4911">Não formatado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4911">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4912">13 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4912">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4913">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4914">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4914">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4915">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4916">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4916">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4917">A expressão regular Regex_israel_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4917">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4918">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_israel_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4918">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4924">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4924">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4925">Número de identificação nacional de Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4925">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4926">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4926">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4927">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4927">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4928">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4928">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4929">nove dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4929">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4930">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4931">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4932">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4933">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4933">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4934">A função Func_israeli_national_id_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4934">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4935">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_Israel_National_ID for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4935">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4936">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4936">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4937">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4937">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4938">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4938">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4939">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4939">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4940">Número de identificação nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4940">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4941">Número da carteira de motorista da Itália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4941">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4942">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de carteira do driver da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4942">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4943">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4943">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4944">uma combinação de 10 letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4944">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4945">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4945">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4946">uma combinação de 10 letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4946">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4947">uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4947">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4948">a letra "A" ou "V" (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4948">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4949">sete letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas), dígitos ou o caractere de sublinhado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4949">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4950">uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4950">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4951">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4952">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4952">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4953">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4954">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4954">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4955">A expressão regular Regex_italy_drivers_license_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4955">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4956">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4956">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4959">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4959">numero di patente di guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4961">Número de identificação nacional da Itália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4961">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4962">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4962">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4963">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4964">uma combinação de 16 caracteres de letras e dígitos no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4964">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4965">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4966">Uma combinação de letras e dígitos de 16 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4966">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4967">três letras que correspondem às três primeiras consoantes no nome da família</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4967">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4968">três letras que correspondem à primeira, terceira e quarta consoantes no primeiro nome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4968">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4969">dois dígitos que correspondem aos últimos dígitos do ano de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4969">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4970">uma letra que corresponde à carta para o mês de nascimento-as letras são usadas em ordem alfabética, mas apenas as letras de a a E, H, L, M, P, R a T são usadas (dessa forma, Janeiro é A e outubro é R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4970">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4971">dois dígitos que correspondem ao dia do mês de nascimento — para diferenciar entre sexos, 40 é adicionado ao dia de nascimento para mulheres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4971">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4972">quatro dígitos que correspondem ao código de área específico do município onde a pessoa nasceu (códigos de todo o país são usados para países estrangeiros)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4972">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4973">um dígito de paridade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4973">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4974">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4975">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4975">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-4976">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-4977">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4977">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4978">A função  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4978">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4979">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4979">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-4980">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4980">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-4981">A função  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-4981">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5016">Número de passaporte da Itália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5016">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5017">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5017">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5018">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5019">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos de sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5019">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5020">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5020">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5021">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5021">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5022">dois dígitos ou letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5022">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5023">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5023">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5024">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5024">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5025">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5025">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5026">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5026">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5027">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5027">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5028">A expressão regular  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5028">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5029">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5029">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5041">Número de identificação de imposto da Itália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5041">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5042">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5042">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5043">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5044">16 letras e dígitos no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5044">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5045">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5046">16 letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5046">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5047">três letras que correspondem às três primeiras consoantes no nome da família</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5047">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5048">três letras que correspondem à primeira, terceira e quarta consoantes no primeiro nome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5048">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5049">dois dígitos que correspondem aos últimos dígitos do ano de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5049">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5050">um dígito que corresponde ao mês de nascimento-as letras são usadas em ordem alfabética, mas apenas as letras de a a E, H, L, M, P, R a T são usadas (portanto, Janeiro é A e outubro é R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5050">one digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5051">dois dígitos que correspondem ao dia do mês de nascimento, onde 40 é adicionado ao dia de nascimento de mulheres para diferenciar da homens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5051">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5052">quatro dígitos que correspondem a um código de área específico para o município onde a pessoa nasceu — códigos em todo o país são usados para países estrangeiros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5052">four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5053">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5053">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5054">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5054">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5055">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5055">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5056">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5056">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5057">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5057">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5058">A função  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5058">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5059">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5059">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5060">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5061">A função  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5061">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5096">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor da Itália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5096">Italy value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5097">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5098">padrão de 13 caracteres alfanuméricos com delimitadores opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5098">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5099">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5100">padrão de 13 caracteres alfanuméricos com delimitadores opcionais:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5100">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5101">I ou i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5101">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5102">T ou t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5102">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5103">espaço, ponto, hífen ou vírgula opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5103">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5104">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5104">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5105">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5106">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5106">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5107">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5108">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5108">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5109">A função Func_italy_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5109">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5110">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5110">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5111">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5112">A função Func_italy_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5112">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5120">Número de conta bancária do Japão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5120">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5121">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5122">sete ou oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5122">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5123">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5124">número da conta bancária:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5124">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5125">sete ou oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5125">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5126">código da filial da conta bancária:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5126">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5127">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5127">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5128">um espaço ou um traço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5128">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5129">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5129">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5130">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5131">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5132">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5133">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5133">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5134">A função Func_jp_bank_account localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5134">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5135">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_bank_account for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5135">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5136">Uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5136">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5137">A função Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5137">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5138">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5138">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5139">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5140">A função Func_jp_bank_account localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5140">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5141">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_bank_account for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5141">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5200">Número da carteira de motorista do Japão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5200">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5201">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5201">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5202">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5202">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5203">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5203">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5204">12 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5204">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5205">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5205">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5206">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5206">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5207">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5207">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5208">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5208">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5209">A função Func_jp_drivers_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5209">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5210">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5210">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5238">Meu número do Japão-corporativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5238">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5239">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5240">número de 13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5240">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5241">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5242">número de 13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5242">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5243">um dígito de um a nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5243">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5244">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5244">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5245">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5246">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5246">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5247">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5248">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5248">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5249">A função Func_japanese_my_number_corporate localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5249">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5250">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5250">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5251">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5251">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5252">A função Func_japanese_my_number_corporate localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5252">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5273">um espaço, um ponto ou hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5273">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5295">Número de passaporte do Japão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5295">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5296">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5297">duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5297">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5298">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5299">duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) seguidas por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5299">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5300">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5300">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5301">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5301">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5302">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5302">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5303">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5304">A função Func_jp_passport localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5304">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5305">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5305">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5312">Número do cartão de residência do Japão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5312">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5313">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5314">12 letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5314">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5315">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5316">12 letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5316">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5317">duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5317">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5318">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5318">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5319">duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5319">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5320">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5321">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5321">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5322">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5323">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5324">A expressão regular Regex_jp_residence_card_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5324">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5325">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_residence_card_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5325">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml

-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5356">Número de seguro social (SIN) do Japão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5356">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5357">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5358">7 a 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5358">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5359">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5360">7 a 12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5360">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5361">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5361">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5362">um hífen (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5362">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5363">seis dígitos ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5363">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5364">7 a 12 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5364">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5365">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5365">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5366">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5366">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5367">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5367">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5368">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5368">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5369">A função Func_jp_sin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5369">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5370">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5370">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5371">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5371">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5372">A função Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5372">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5373">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5373">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5382">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5382">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5383">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5384">três letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5384">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5385">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5386">três letras e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5386">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5387">três letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5387">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5388">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5388">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5389">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5389">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5390">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5390">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5391">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5391">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5392">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5392">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5393">A expressão regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5393">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5394">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5394">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5410">Número de identificação nacional da Letônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5410">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5411">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5411">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5412">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5412">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5413">11 dígitos e um hífen no formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5413">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5414">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5414">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5415">11 dígitos e um hífen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5415">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5416">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5416">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5417">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5417">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5418">um dígito que corresponde ao século de nascimento ("0" para o século 19, "1" para o século 20 e "2" para o século 21)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5418">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5419">quatro dígitos, gerados aleatoriamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5419">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5420">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5420">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5421">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5421">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5422">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5422">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5423">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5423">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5424">A função  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5424">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5425">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5425">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5426">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5426">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5427">A função  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5427">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5490">Número de passaporte da Letônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5490">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5491">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5491">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5492">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5492">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5493">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos de sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5493">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5494">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5494">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5495">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5495">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5496">dois dígitos ou letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5496">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5497">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5497">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5498">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5498">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5499">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5499">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5500">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5500">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5501">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5502">A expressão regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5502">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5503">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5503">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5510">Número de identificação de imposto da Letônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5510">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5511">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5511">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5512">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5512">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5513">11 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5513">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5514">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5514">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5515">11 dígitos no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5515">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5516">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5516">six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5517">um dígito que corresponde ao século de nascimento onde "0" corresponde ao século 19, "1" corresponde a 20 Century e "2" corresponde ao século 21</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5517">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5518">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5518">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5519">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5520">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5520">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5521">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5522">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5522">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5523">A função  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5523">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5524">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5524">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5525">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5525">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5526">A função  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5526">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5589">Número da carteira de motorista da Lituânia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5589">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5590">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5590">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5591">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5592">oito dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5592">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5593">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5594">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5594">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5595">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5596">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5596">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5597">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5598">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5599">A expressão regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5599">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5600">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5600">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5616">Número de identificação nacional da Lituânia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5616">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5617">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5617">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5618">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5619">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5619">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5620">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5621">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5621">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5622">um dígito que corresponde ao sexo da pessoa e ao século de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5622">one digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5623">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5623">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5624">três dígitos que correspondem ao número de série da data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5624">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5625">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5625">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5626">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5627">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5627">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5628">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5629">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5629">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5630">A função  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5630">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5631">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5631">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5632">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5632">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5633">A função  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5633">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
