## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5668">Número de passaporte da Lituânia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5668">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5669">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5669">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5670">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5671">oito dígitos ou letras sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5671">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5672">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5673">oito dígitos ou letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5673">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5674">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5675">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5675">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5676">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5677">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5678">A expressão regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5678">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5679">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5679">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5686">Número de identificação de imposto da Lituânia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5686">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5687">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5687">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5688">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5688">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5689">11 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5689">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5690">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5690">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5691">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5691">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5692">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5693">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5693">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5694">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5695">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5695">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5696">A função  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5696">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5697">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5697">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5698">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5698">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5699">A função  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5699">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5733">Número da carteira de motorista do Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5733">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5734">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5734">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5735">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5736">seis dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5736">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5737">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5738">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5738">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5739">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5740">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5740">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5741">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5742">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5742">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5743">A expressão regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5743">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5744">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5744">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5760">Número de identificação nacional do Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5760">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5761">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5761">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5762">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5763">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5763">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5764">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5765">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5765">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5766">um dígito que corresponde ao sexo da pessoa e ao século de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5766">one digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5767">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5767">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5768">três dígitos que correspondem ao número de série da data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5768">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5769">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5769">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5770">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5770">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5771">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5771">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5772">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5772">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5773">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5773">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5774">A expressão regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5774">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5775">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5775">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5798">Número de passaporte Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5798">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5799">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5799">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5800">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5800">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5801">oito dígitos ou letras sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5801">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5802">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5802">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5803">oito dígitos ou letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5803">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5804">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5805">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5805">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5806">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5807">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5807">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5808">A expressão regular  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5808">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5809">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5809">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5816">Número de identificação do imposto Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5816">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5817">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5817">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5818">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5819">13 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5819">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5820">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5821">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5821">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5822">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5822">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5823">dois dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5823">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5824">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5825">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5825">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5826">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5827">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5827">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5828">A função  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5828">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5829">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5829">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5830">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5830">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5831">A função  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5831">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5871">Número do cartão de identificação da Malásia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5871">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5872">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5873">12 dígitos contendo hifens opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5873">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5874">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5875">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5875">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5876">seis dígitos no formato AAMMDD que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5876">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5877">um traço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5877">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5878">código de local de nascimento de duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5878">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5879">um traço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5879">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5880">três dígitos aleatórios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5880">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5881">código sexo de um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5881">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5882">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5883">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5883">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5884">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5885">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5885">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5886">A expressão regular Regex_malaysia_id_card_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5886">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5887">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5887">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5914">Número da carteira de motorista do driver de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5914">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5915">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5915">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5916">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5916">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5917">Combinação de dois caracteres e seis dígitos no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5917">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5918">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5918">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5919">combinação de dois caracteres e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5919">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5920">dois caracteres (dígitos ou letras, não diferenciam maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5920">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5921">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5921">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5922">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5922">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5923">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5923">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5924">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5924">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5925">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5925">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5926">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5926">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5927">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5927">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5928">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5928">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5929">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5929">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5930">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5930">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5946">Número de identificação nacional de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5946">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5947">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5947">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5948">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5949">sete dígitos seguidos de uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5949">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5950">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5951">sete dígitos seguidos de uma letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5951">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5952">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5952">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5953">uma letra maiúscula (diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5953">one uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5954">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5955">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5955">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5956">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5957">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5957">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5958">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5958">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5959">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5959">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5960">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5960">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5961">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5961">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5978">Número de passaporte de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5978">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5979">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5979">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5980">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5981">sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5981">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5982">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5983">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5983">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5984">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5985">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5985">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5986">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5987">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5987">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5988">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5988">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-5989">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5989">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5996">Número de identificação do imposto de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5996">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-5997">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5997">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-5998">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-5999">Para as nacionalidades maltês:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-5999">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6000">sete dígitos e uma letra no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6000">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6010">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6010">Not applicable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6012">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6013">A função  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6013">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6015">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6015">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6016">A função  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6016">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />

</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6049">Número do serviço do cidadão (BSN) Holanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6049">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6050">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6050">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6051">oito e nove dígitos contendo espaços opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6051">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6052">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6052">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6053">oito-nove dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6053">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6054">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6054">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6055">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6055">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6056">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6056">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6057">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6057">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6058">dois-três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6058">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6059">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6060">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6060">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6061">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6062">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6062">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6063">A função Func_netherlands_bsn localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6063">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6064">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_netherlands_bsn for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6064">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6065">A função Func_eu_date2 localiza uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6065">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6066">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6090">Número da carteira de motorista da Holanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6090">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6099">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6099">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6124">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6124">nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6131">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6131">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6177">Número de identificação do imposto Holanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6177">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-6178">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6178">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6179">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6180">nove dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6180">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6181">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6182">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6182">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6183">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6183">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6184">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6184">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6185">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6185">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6186">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6186">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6187">A função  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6187">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6188">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6188">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-6189">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6190">A função  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6190">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6228">Número de imposto sobre valor Holanda adicionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6228">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6229">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6230">padrão de 14 caracteres alfanuméricos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6230">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6231">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6232">padrão alfanumérico de 14 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6232">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6233">N ou n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6233">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6234">L ou l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6234">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6235">espaço, ponto ou hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6235">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6236">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6236">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6237">espaço, ponto ou hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6237">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6238">B ou b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6238">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6239">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6239">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6240">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6240">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6241">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6241">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6242">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6242">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6243">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6243">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6244">A função Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6244">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6245">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6245">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6246">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6247">A função Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6247">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6256">Número de conta bancária da Nova Zelândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6256">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6257">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6258">padrão de 14 a 16 dígitos com delimitador opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6258">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6259">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6260">padrão de 14 a 16 dígitos com delimitador opcional:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6260">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6261">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6261">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6262">um hífen ou espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6262">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6263">três a quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6263">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6264">um hífen ou espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6264">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6265">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6265">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6266">um hífen ou espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6266">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6267">dois a três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6267">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6268">um hífen ou espaço de opções</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6268">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6269">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6269">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6270">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6270">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6271">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6271">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6272">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6272">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6273">A função Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6273">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6274">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6274">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6275">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6276">A função Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6276">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6277">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6277">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6284">Número da carteira de motorista da Nova Zelândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6284">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6285">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6286">padrão de oito caracteres alfanuméricos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6286">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6287">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6288">padrão de oito caracteres alfanuméricos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6288">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6289">duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6289">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6290">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6290">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6291">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6292">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6292">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6293">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6294">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6294">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6295">A função Func_newzealand_driver_license_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6295">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6296">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6296">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6297">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6297">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6298">A função Func_newzealand_driver_license_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6298">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6365">Número de receita da Nova Zelândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6365">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6366">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6367">oito ou nove dígitos com delimitadores opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6367">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6368">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6369">oito ou nove dígitos com delimitadores opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6369">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6370">dois ou três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6370">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6371">um espaço ou hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6371">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6372">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6372">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6373">um espaço ou hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6373">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6374">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6374">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6375">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6376">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6376">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6377">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6377">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6378">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6378">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6379">A função Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6379">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6380">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6380">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6381">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6381">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6382">A função Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6382">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6391">Ministério do número de integridade da Nova Zelândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6391">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6392">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6393">três letras, um espaço (opcional) e quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6393">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6394">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6395">três letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) um espaço (opcional) quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6395">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6396">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6397">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6397">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6398">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6399">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6400">A função Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6400">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6401">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_nz_terms for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6401">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6402">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6402">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6409">Número de wlefare social da Nova Zelândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6409">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6410">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6410">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6412">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6413">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6413">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6414">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6414">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6415">um hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6415">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6416">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6416">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6417">um hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6417">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6418">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6418">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6419">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6420">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6420">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6421">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6422">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6422">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6423">A função Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6423">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6424">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6424">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6425">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6425">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6426">A função Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6426">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6434">Número de identificação da Noruega</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6434">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6435">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6436">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6436">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6437">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6438">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6438">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6439">seis dígitos no formato DDMMAA que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6439">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6440">número individual de três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6440">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6441">dois dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6441">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6442">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6443">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6443">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6444">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6445">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6445">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6446">A função Func_norway_id_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6446">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6447">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_norway_id_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6447">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6448">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6448">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6449">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6449">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6450">A função Func_norway_id_numbe localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6450">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6451">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6460">Número de identificação de multiuso unificado Filipinas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6460">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6461">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6462">12 dígitos separados por hifens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6462">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6463">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6464">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6464">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6465">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6465">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6466">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6466">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6467">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6467">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6468">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6468">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6469">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6469">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6470">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6471">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6472">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6473">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6473">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6474">A expressão regular Regex_philippines_unified_id localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6474">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6475">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_philippines_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6475">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
