## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6514">Cartão de identidade da Polônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6514">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6515">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6516">três letras e seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6516">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6517">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6518">três letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6518">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6519">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6520">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6520">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6521">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6522">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6523">A função Func_polish_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6523">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6524">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6524">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6525">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6525">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6536">ID nacional da Polônia (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6536">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6538">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6539">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6539">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6540">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6541">11 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6541">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6542">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6543">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6543">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6544">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6545">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6545">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6546">A função Func_pesel_identification_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6546">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6547">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_pesel_identification_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6547">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6548">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6548">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6560">Número de passaporte da Polônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6560">Poland passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6570">A função Func_polish_passport_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6570">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6571">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6571">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6572">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6572">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6579">Número da Polônia REGON</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6579">Poland REGON number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6580">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6580">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6581">número de nove dígitos ou 14 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6581">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6582">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6582">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6583">número de nove dígitos ou 14 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6583">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6584">nove dígitos ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6584">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6585">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6585">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6586">hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6586">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6587">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6587">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6588">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6588">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6589">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6589">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6590">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6590">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6591">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6591">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6592">A função Func_polish_regon_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6592">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6593">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_polish_regon_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6593">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6594">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6594">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6595">A função Func_polish_regon_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6595">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6612">Número de identificação de imposto da Polônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6612">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-6613">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6613">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6614">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6615">11 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6615">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6616">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6617">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6617">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6618">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6619">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6619">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6620">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6621">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6621">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6622">A função  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6622">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6623">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6623">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-6624">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6624">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6625">A função  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6625">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6655">Número de cartão de cidadão da Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6655">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6656">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6656">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6657">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no número de seguridade social da UE ou no tipo de informação confidencial de ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6657">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6658">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6659">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6659">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6660">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6661">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6661">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6662">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6663">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6663">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6664">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6665">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6665">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6666">A expressão regular Regex_portugal_citizen_card localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6666">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6667">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_portugal_citizen_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6667">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6687">Número da carteira de motorista de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6687">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-6688">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6688">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6689">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6690">duas letras seguidas por sete números no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6690">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6691">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6692">duas letras seguidas por sete números com caracteres especiais:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6692">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6693">duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6693">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6694">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6694">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6695">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6695">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6696">um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6696">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6697">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6697">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6698">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6699">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6699">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6700">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6701">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6701">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6702">A expressão regular  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6702">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6703">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6703">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6719">Número de passaporte de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6719">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-6720">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6720">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6721">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6722">uma letra seguida de seis dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6722">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6723">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6724">uma letra seguida por seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6724">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6725">uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6725">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6726">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6726">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6727">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6728">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6728">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6729">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6729">Definition</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6745">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6751">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6751">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6752">A função  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6752">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6777">Número da carteira de motorista do Romênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6777">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-6778">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6778">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6779">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6779">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6781">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6782">um caractere seguido por oito dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6782">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6789">A expressão regular  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6789">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6790">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6790">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
```

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6818">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6818">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6819">A função  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6819">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6870">Número de passaporte da Romênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6870">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-6871">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6872">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6873">oito ou nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6873">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6874">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6875">oito ou nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6875">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6876">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6877">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6877">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6878">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6879">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6880">A expressão regular  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6880">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6881">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6881">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6888">Número de identificação do imposto da Romênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6888">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-6889">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6889">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6890">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6890">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6891">13 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6891">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6892">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6892">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6893">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6893">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6894">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6894">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6895">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6895">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6896">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6896">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6897">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6897">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6898">A expressão regular  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6898">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6899">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6899">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6950">Número de passaporte nacional da Rússia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6950">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6951">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6951">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6952">número de dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6952">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6953">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6953">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-6954">número de dez dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6954">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6955">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6955">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6956">um espaço ou hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6956">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6957">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6957">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6958">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6958">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-6959">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6959">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-6960">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-6960">Checksum</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7012">ID nacional da Arábia Saudita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7012">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7013">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7014">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7014">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7015">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7016">dez dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7016">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7017">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7017">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7018">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7018">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7019">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7019">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7020">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7020">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7021">A expressão regular Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7021">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7022">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7022">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7029">Número do cartão de identidade do Registro Nacional (NRIC) da Cingapura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7029">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7030">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7030">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7031">nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7031">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7032">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7032">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7033">nove letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7033">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7034">a letra "F", "G", "S" ou "T" (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7034">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7035">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7035">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7036">um dígito de verificação alfabética</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7036">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7037">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7038">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7038">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7039">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7040">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7040">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7041">A expressão regular Regex_singapore_nric localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7041">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7042">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_singapore_nric for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7042">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7043">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7043">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7044">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7044">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7045">A expressão regular Regex_singapore_nric localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7045">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7046">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7046">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7058">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7058">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7061">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7062">um caractere seguido por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7062">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7063">uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) ou dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7063">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7222">Número da carteira de motorista do Eslovênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7222">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7223">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7223">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7224">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7225">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7225">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7226">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7227">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7227">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7228">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7229">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7230">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7231">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7231">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7232">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7232">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7233">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7233">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7249">Número de identificação nacional da Eslovênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7249">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7250">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7250">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7251">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7251">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7252">13 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7252">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7253">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7253">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7254">13 dígitos no padrão especificado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7254">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7255">sete dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMLLL), onde "LLL" corresponde aos últimos três dígitos do ano de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7255">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7256">dois dígitos que correspondem à área de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7256">two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7257">três dígitos que correspondem a uma combinação de sexo e número de série para pessoas nasceu no mesmo dia (000-499 para macho e 500-999 para fêmea)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7257">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7258">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7258">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7259">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7260">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7260">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7261">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7262">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7262">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7263">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7263">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7264">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7264">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7265">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7265">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7266">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7266">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7294">Número de passaporte da Eslovênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7294">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7295">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7295">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7296">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7297">duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7297">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7298">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7299">duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7299">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7300">a letra "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7300">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7301">uma letra maiúscula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7301">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7302">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7302">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7303">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7303">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7304">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7304">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7305">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7305">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7306">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7306">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7307">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7307">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7308">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7308">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7315">Número de identificação do imposto da Eslovênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7315">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7316">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7316">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7317">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7317">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7318">oito dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7318">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7319">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7319">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7320">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7320">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7321">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7321">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7322">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7322">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7323">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7324">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7324">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7325">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7325">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7326">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7326">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7327">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7327">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7328">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7328">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7352">Número de identificação da África do Sul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7352">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7353">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7354">13 dígitos que podem conter espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7354">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7355">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7356">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7356">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7357">seis dígitos no formato AAMMDD que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7357">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7358">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7358">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7359">um indicador de cidadania de um único dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7359">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7360">o dígito "8" ou "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7360">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7361">um dígito que é um dígito de soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7361">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7362">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7363">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7363">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7364">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7365">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7365">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7366">A função Func_south_africa_identification_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7366">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7367">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_south_africa_identification_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7367">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7368">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7368">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7374">Número de registro residente da Coréia do Sul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7374">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7375">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7375">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7376">13 dígitos que contém um hifen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7376">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7377">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7377">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7378">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7378">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7379">seis dígitos no formato AAMMDD que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7379">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7380">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7380">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7381">um dígito determinado pelo século e sexo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7381">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7382">código de região de nascimento de quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7382">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7383">um dígito usado para diferenciar pessoas para as quais os números anteriores são idênticos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7383">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7384">um dígito de verificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7384">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7385">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7386">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7386">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7387">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7388">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7388">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7389">A função Func_south_korea_resident_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7389">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7390">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_south_korea_resident_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7390">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7391">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7391">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7392">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7392">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7393">A função Func_south_korea_resident_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7393">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7394">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7394">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7395">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7395">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7402">Número da carteira de motorista da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7402">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7403">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7403">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7404">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7405">oito dígitos seguidos de um caractere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7405">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7406">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7407">oito dígitos seguidos de um caractere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7407">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7408">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7408">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7409">um dígito ou letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7409">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7410">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7411">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7411">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7412">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7413">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7413">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7414">A função  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7414">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7415">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7415">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7452">Número de identificação nacional da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7452">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7453">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7453">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7454">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7455">sete dígitos seguidos de um caractere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7455">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7456">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7457">sete dígitos seguidos de um caractere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7457">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7458">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7458">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7459">um dígito ou letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7459">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7460">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7461">não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7461">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7462">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7463">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7464">A expressão regular  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7464">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7465">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7465">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7489">Número de passaporte da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7489">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7490">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7490">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7491">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7491">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7492">uma combinação de letras e números de oito ou nove caracteres sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7492">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7493">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7493">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7494">uma combinação de letras e números de oito ou nove caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7494">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7495">dois dígitos ou letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7495">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7496">um dígito ou letra (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7496">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7497">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7497">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7498">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7498">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7499">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7499">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7500">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7500">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7501">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7502">A expressão regular  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7502">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7503">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7503">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
