## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7515">Número da segurança social da Espanha (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7515">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7516">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no número de segurança social da UE ou tipo de informação confidencial de ID equivalente e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7516">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7517">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7517">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7518">11 a 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7518">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7519">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7519">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7520">11-12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7520">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7521">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7521">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7522">uma barra (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7522">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7523">sete a oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7523">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7524">uma barra (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7524">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7525">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7525">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7526">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7526">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7527">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7527">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7528">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7528">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7529">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7529">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7530">A função Func_spanish_social_security_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7530">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7531">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7531">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7532">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7532">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7533">Nenhum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7533">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7534">Número de identificação de imposto da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7534">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7535">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7535">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7536">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7537">sete ou oito dígitos e uma ou duas letras no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7537">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7538">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7539">Pessoas naturais do espanhol com um cartão de identidade nacional da Espanha:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7539">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7540">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7540">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7541">uma letra maiúscula (diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7541">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7542">Spaniards não residente sem um cartão de identidade nacional da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7542">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7543">uma letra maiúscula "L" (diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7543">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7544">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7544">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7545">uma letra maiúscula (diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7545">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7546">Spaniards residentes sob a idade de 14 anos sem um cartão de identidade nacional da Espanha:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7546">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7547">uma letra maiúscula "K" (diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7547">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7548">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7548">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7549">uma letra maiúscula (diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7549">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7550">Foreigners com o número de identificação do estrangeiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7550">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7551">uma letra maiúscula que é "X", "Y" ou "Z" (diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7551">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7552">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7552">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7553">uma letra maiúscula (diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7553">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7554">Foreigners sem um número de identificação do estrangeiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7554">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7555">uma letra maiúscula que é "M" (diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7555">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7556">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7556">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7557">uma letra maiúscula (diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7557">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7558">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7559">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7559">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7560">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7561">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7561">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7562">A função  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7562">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7563">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7563">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7564">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7564">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7565">A função  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7565">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7596">Cadeia de caracteres de conexão do SQL Server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7596">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7597">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7598">A cadeia de caracteres "User ID", "User ID", "UID" ou "UserId" seguida dos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7598">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7599">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7600">a cadeia de caracteres "User ID", "User ID", "UID" ou "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7600">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7601">qualquer combinação entre 1-200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7601">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7602">a cadeia de caracteres "password" ou "pwd", onde "pwd" não é precedida por uma letra minúscula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7602">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7603">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7603">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7604">qualquer caractere que não seja um cifrão ($), símbolo de porcentagem (%), maior que símbolo (>), no símbolo (@), aspas ("), ponto e vírgula (;), chave esquerda ([) ou colchete esquerdo ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7604">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7605">qualquer combinação de 7-128 caracteres que não seja um ponto-e-vírgula (;), barra (/) ou aspas (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7605">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7606">um ponto e vírgula (;) ou aspas (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7606">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7607">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7608">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7609">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7610">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7610">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7611">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7611">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7612">Uma palavra-chave de CEP_GlobalFilter **não** é encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7612">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7613">A expressão regular CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder não **localiza o** conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7613">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7614">A expressão regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords não **localiza o** conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7614">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7615">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7615">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7616">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7616">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7617">algumas-senha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7617">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7618">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7618">somepassword</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7642">Número da carteira de motorista do Suécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7642">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7643">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informações confidenciais do número de licença do driver da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7643">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7644">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7645">dez dígitos contendo um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7645">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7646">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7647">dez dígitos contendo um hífen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7647">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7648">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7648">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7649">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7649">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7650">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7650">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7651">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7651">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7652">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7652">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7653">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7653">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7654">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7655">A expressão regular  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7655">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7656">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7656">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7672">ID nacional da Suécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7672">Sweden national ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7673">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7673">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7674">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7675">10 ou 12 dígitos e um delimitador opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7675">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7676">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7677">10 ou 12 dígitos e um delimitador opcional:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7677">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7678">dois a quatro dígitos (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7678">two to four digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7679">Seis dígitos no formato de data AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7679">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7680">delimitador de "-" ou "+" (opcional), mais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7680">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7681">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7681">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7682">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7683">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7683">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7684">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7685">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7685">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7686">A função Func_swedish_national_identifier localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7686">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7687">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7687">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7689">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7689">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7690">Número de passaporte da Suécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7690">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7691">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número do Passport da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7691">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7692">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7693">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7693">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7694">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7695">oito dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7695">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7696">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7697">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7698">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7699">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7699">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7700">a expressão regular Regex_sweden_passport_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7700">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7701">uma das seguintes opções é verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7701">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-7702">uma palavra-chave de Keyword_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7702">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-7703">uma palavra-chave de Keyword_sweden_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7703">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7734">Número da segurança social da Suécia ou identificação equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7734">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7735">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no número de seguridade social da UE ou no tipo de informações confidenciais de ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7735">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7736">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7737">12 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7737">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7738">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7739">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7739">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7740">oito dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAAAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7740">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7741">três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série em que:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7741">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="35310-7742">o último dígito no número de série indica sexo pela atribuição de um número ímpar para macho e um número par para o fêmea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7742">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="35310-7743">até 1990, a atribuição de número de série correspondente à região onde o portador do número nasceu ou (se nasceu antes de 1947) em que ele/ela estava em vida, de acordo com os registros de impostos, em 1º de janeiro de 1947, com um código especial (geralmente 9 como o sétimo dígito) para immigrants</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7743">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7744">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7744">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7745">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7746">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7747">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7748">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7748">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7749">A função  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7749">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7750">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7750">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7751">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7751">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7752">A função  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7752">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7768">Número de identificação do imposto da Suécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7768">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7769">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7769">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7770">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7771">dez dígitos e um símbolo no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7771">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7772">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7773">dez dígitos e um símbolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7773">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7774">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7774">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7775">um sinal de adição, sinal de menos ou barra invertida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7775">a plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7776">três dígitos que tornam o número de identificação exclusivo, onde:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7776">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="35310-7777">para números emitidos antes de 1990, o sétimo e oitavo dígito identificam o Condado de nascimento ou pessoas de nasceu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7777">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="35310-7778">o dígito na nona posição indica sexo por tanto ímpar para masculino ou par para fêmea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7778">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7779">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7779">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7780">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7781">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7781">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7782">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7783">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7783">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7784">A função  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7784">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7785">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7785">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7786">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7786">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7787">A função  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7787">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7813">Código SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7813">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7814">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7815">quatro letras seguidas por 5-31 letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7815">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7816">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7817">quatro letras seguidas por 5-31 letras ou dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7817">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7818">código bancário de quatro letras (não diferencia maiúscula de minúscula)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7818">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7819">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7819">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7820">4 a 28 letras ou dígitos (o número de conta bancária básica (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7820">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7821">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7821">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7822">uma ou três letras ou dígitos (restante do BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7822">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7823">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7824">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7824">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7825">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7826">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7826">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7827">A expressão regular Regex_swift localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7827">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7828">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_swift for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7828">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7829">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7829">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="swiss-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7862">Número do AHV SSN suíço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7862">Swiss SSN AHV number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7863">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7864">número de 13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7864">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7865">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7866">número de 13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7866">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7867">três dígitos-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7867">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7868">um ponto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7868">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7869">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7869">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7870">um ponto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7870">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7871">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7871">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7872">um ponto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7872">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7873">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7873">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7874">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7875">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7875">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7876">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7877">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7877">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7878">A função Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7878">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7879">Uma palavra-chave de Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7879">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7880">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7880">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7881">A função Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7881">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7902">Número de identificação nacional de Taiwan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7902">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7903">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7904">uma letra (em inglês) seguida de nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7904">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7905">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7906">uma letra (em inglês) seguida de nove dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7906">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7907">uma letra (em inglês, não diferencia maiúscula de minúscula)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7907">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7908">o dígito "1" ou "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7908">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7909">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7909">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7910">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7911">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7911">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7912">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7913">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7913">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7914">A função Func_taiwanese_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7914">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7915">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_taiwanese_national_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7915">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7916">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7916">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7917">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7917">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7918">A função Func_taiwanese_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7918">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7919">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7919">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7936">Número de passaporte de Taiwan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7936">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7937">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7937">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7938">número de passaporte biométrico: nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7938">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7939">número de passaporte não biométrico: nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7939">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7940">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7940">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-7941">número de passaporte biométrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7941">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7942">o caractere "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7942">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7943">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7943">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7944">número de passaporte não biométrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7944">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7945">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7945">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7946">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7947">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7947">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7948">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7949">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7949">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7950">A expressão regular Regex_taiwan_passport localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7950">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7951">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_taiwan_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7951">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7952">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7952">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7953">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7953">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7962">Número de certificado residente (arco/TARC) de Taiwan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7962">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7963">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7964">Dez letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7964">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7965">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7966">Dez letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7966">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7967">duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7967">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7968">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7968">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7969">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7970">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7970">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7971">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7972">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7972">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7973">A expressão regular Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7973">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7974">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7974">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7988">Código de identificação de população em tailandês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7988">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7989">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7989">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7990">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7990">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7991">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7991">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7992">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7992">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7993">o primeiro dígito não é zero ou nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7993">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7994">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7994">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7995">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7996">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7996">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-7997">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-7998">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7998">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-7999">A função Func_Thai_Citizen_Id localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-7999">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8000">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8000">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8001">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8001">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8002">A função Func_Thai_Citizen_Id localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8002">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8011">Número de identificação nacional turco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8011">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8012">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8012">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8014">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8014">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8015">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8015">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8016">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8017">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8017">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8019">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8019">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8022">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8022">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8023">A função Func_Turkish_National_Id localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8023">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8030">britânico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8030">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35310-8031">número da carteira de motorista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8031">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-8032">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número de carteira do driver da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8032">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8033">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8033">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8034">Combinação de 18 letras e dígitos no formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8034">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8035">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8035">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8036">18 letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8036">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8037">cinco letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) ou o dígito "9" em vez de uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8037">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8038">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8038">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8039">cinco dígitos no formato de data MMDDY para data de nascimento (o sétimo caractere é incrementado por 50 se o driver for fêmea, ou seja, 51 a 62 em vez de 01 a 12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8039">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8040">duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) ou o dígito "9" em vez de uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8040">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8041">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8041">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8042">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8042">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8043">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8043">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8044">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8044">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8045">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8045">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8046">A função Func_uk_drivers_license localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8046">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8047">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8047">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8048">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8048">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8064">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8064">driving licence</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8066">britânico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8066">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35310-8067">número de rolo electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8067">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8068">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8069">duas letras seguidas por 1-4 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8069">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8070">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8071">duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) seguidas por números de 1-4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8071">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8072">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8073">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8073">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8074">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8075">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8075">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8076">A expressão regular Regex_uk_electoral localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8076">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8077">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_electoral for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8077">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8079">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8079">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8084">britânico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8084">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35310-8085">número do serviço de integridade nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8085">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8086">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8087">10 a 17 dígitos separados por espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8087">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8088">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8089">10 a 17 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8089">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8090">três ou dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8090">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8091">um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8091">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8092">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8092">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8093">um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8093">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8094">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8094">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8095">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8096">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8096">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8097">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8098">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8098">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8099">A função Func_uk_nhs_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8099">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8100">Uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8100">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-8101">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8101">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-8102">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8102">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-8103">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8103">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8104">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8104">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
