## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8122">britânico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8122">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35310-8123">número de seguro nacional (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8123">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-8124">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial está incluída no tipo de informação confidencial do número Identificaiton nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidencial autônoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8124">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8125">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8126">sete caracteres ou nove caracteres separados por espaços ou traços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8126">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8127">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8127">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8128">dois padrões possíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8128">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8129">duas letras (NINOs válidas usam apenas determinados caracteres neste prefixo, que esse padrão valida; não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8129">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8130">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8130">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8131">"A", "B", "C" ou "(como o prefixo, apenas determinados caracteres são permitidos no sufixo; não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8131">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8132">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8132">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8133">duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8133">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8134">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8134">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8135">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8135">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8136">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8136">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8137">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8137">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8138">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8138">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8139">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8139">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8140">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8140">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8141">' A ', ' B ', ' C' ou ' d'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8141">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8142">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8143">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8143">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8144">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8145">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8145">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8146">A função Func_uk_nino localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8146">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8147">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nino for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8147">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8148">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8148">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8149">A função Func_uk_nino localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8149">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8150">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nino for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8150">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8172">britânico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8172">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35310-8173">número de identificação do imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8173">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="35310-8174">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidencial só está disponível no tipo de informação confidencial do número de identificação de imposto da UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8174">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8175">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8176">Referência de contribuidor exclusivo (UTR): 10 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8176">unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8177">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8178">Referência de contribuidor exclusivo (UTR): 10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8178">unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8179">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8180">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8180">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8181">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8182">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8182">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8183">A função  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8183">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8184">Uma palavra-chave de  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8184">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8204">Número de conta bancária dos EUA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8204">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8205">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8206">8 a 17 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8206">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8207">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8207">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8208">8 a 17 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8208">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8209">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8209">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8210">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8210">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8211">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8211">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8212">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8212">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8213">A expressão regular Regex_usa_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8213">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8214">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_usa_Bank_Account for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8214">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8244">Número da carteira de motorista dos EUA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8244">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8245">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8246">Depende do estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8246">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8247">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8248">depende do estado – por exemplo, Nova York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8248">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8249">nove dígitos formatados como DDD DDD DDD corresponderão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8249">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8250">nove dígitos como ddddddddd não serão correspondentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8250">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8251">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8251">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8252">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8252">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8253">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8253">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8254">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8254">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8255">A função Func_new_york_drivers_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8255">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8256">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8256">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8257">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_us_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8257">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8258">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8258">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8259">A função Func_new_york_drivers_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8259">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8260">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8260">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8261">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8261">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8262">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_us_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8262">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8360">Número de identificação de contribuinte individual (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8360">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8361">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8362">nove dígitos que começam com um "9" e contêm um "7" ou "8" como o quarto dígito, opcionalmente formatado com espaços ou traços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8362">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8363">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8363">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8364">binário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8364">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8365">o dígito "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8365">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8366">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8366">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8367">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8367">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8368">um "7" ou "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8368">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8369">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8369">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8370">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8370">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8371">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8371">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8372">não formatado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8372">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8373">o dígito "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8373">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8374">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8374">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8375">um "7" ou "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8375">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8376">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8376">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8377">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8377">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8378">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8378">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8379">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8379">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8380">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8380">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8381">A função Func_formatted_itin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8381">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8382">Pelo menos uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8382">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-8383">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_itin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8383">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-8384">A função Func_us_address encontrar um endereço no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8384">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-8385">A função Func_us_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8385">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-8386">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_itin_collaborative for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8386">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8387">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8387">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8388">A função Func_unformatted_itin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8388">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8389">Pelo menos uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8389">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-8390">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_itin_collaborative for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8390">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-8391">A função Func_us_address encontrar um endereço no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8391">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="35310-8392">A função Func_us_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8392">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8413">Número de CPF (cadastro social dos EUA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8413">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8414">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8414">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8415">nove dígitos, que podem estar em um padrão formatado ou não formatado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8415">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="35310-8416">Se emitido antes de meados de 2011, um SSN tem uma formatação forte, onde determinadas partes do número devem estar dentro de determinados intervalos para serem válidos (mas não há nenhum checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8416">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8417">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8418">quatro funções procuram CPFs em quatro padrões diferentes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8418">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8419">Func_ssn localiza CPFs com formatação forte de 2011 formatada com traços ou espaços (DDD-DD-dddd ou DDD DD dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8419">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8420">Func_unformatted_ssn localiza CPFs com uma formatação forte anterior à 2011 que não são formatadas como nove dígitos consecutivos (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8420">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8421">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn localiza CPFs post-2011 que são formatados com traços ou espaços (DDD-DD-dddd ou DDD DD dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8421">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8422">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn localiza CPFs post-2011 que não estão formatados como nove dígitos consecutivos (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8422">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8423">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8424">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8424">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="35310-8425">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8426">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8426">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8427">A função Func_ssn localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8427">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8428">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ssn for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8428">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8429">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8429">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8430">A função Func_unformatted_ssn localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8430">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8431">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ssn for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8431">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8432">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8432">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8433">A função Func_randomized_formatted_ssn localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8433">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8434">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ssn for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8434">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35310-8435">Uma política de DLP tem 55% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8435">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8436">A função Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8436">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35310-8437">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ssn for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35310-8437">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```
